welcome_message_body: Welcome to Lahore, the heart of Pakistan! Get ready to immerse yourself in the city's rich history, vibrant culture, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore the bustling bazaars, stunning architecture, and warm hospitality that Lahore is known for. Enjoy your stay!
